animeTitle: Detective Conan: Happy New Year Special
animeDescription: Special episode consisting of two short stories. The first being an expanded version of Detective Conan: The Fugitive Kogorou Mouri, which was never aired on TV till now. The second half being a brand new New Years Day segment.
animeRelated: ['Detective Conan', 'Detective Conan: The Fugitive Kogorou Mouri']
